name: AFGBuildableStorage
comment: Base class for all storage boxes, large and small. May have an arbitrary number of inputs and outputs.

methods.name: GetLifetimeReplicatedProps
methods.comment: Decide on what properties to replicate

methods.name: GetStorageInventory
methods.comment: Get the storage inventory from this storage box.

properties.name: mStackingHeight
properties.comment: How far apart in Z do multiple storages stack.

properties.name: mDefaultResources
properties.comment: Default resources in a storage @todo Why this special case here, add the stuff in blueprint instead first time we're being built... I guess this is only used for the tutorial?

properties.name: mInventorySizeX
properties.comment: The size of the inventory for this storage.

properties.name: mInventorySizeY
properties.comment: The size of the inventory for this storage.

properties.name: mStorageInventory
properties.comment: The inventory to store everything in. Don't use this directly, use mStorageInventoryHandler->GetActiveInventoryComponent()

properties.name: mStorageInventoryHandler
properties.comment: Maintainer of the active storage component for this actor. Use this to get the active inventory component.

properties.name: mCachedInputConnections
properties.comment: Cached input connections (No need for UPROPERTY as they are referenced in component array)
